verbs.description: [ARG1: pigs] [V: rescued] [ARG2: from fire] later served as sausage to firefighters who rescued them a farmer thanked firefighters who rescued a litter of piglets and two sows from a barn fire in february by giving them sausages according to local reports sausage pewsey food chain rachel rivers
